topics.body:
Just watched horns, that Daniel Radcliffe movie 
The one where he has horns. 
Basically the premise of the movie is that Daniel Radcliffe's character's girlfriend gets murdered and everyone thinks he did it. Then he grows horns and basically gets satan powers which make people confess their deepest desires and he can make them go for it or not

It was pretty good. Reminded me of something a more somber James gunn would do. 
Like, there's still the dark humor but not as much as something like slither or super. 
The director's Alex Aja. Might have to keep an eye on them

The dragon would have a chance too considering slightly better maneuverability, strength, and fire breath.
